source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_00<tab>Gogolata doesn't want to go home.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハから来た交易商のゴゴラタは、家に帰りたくないようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_01<tab>Gogolata is enjoying the comforts of life on the road, and seeks to delay his return home for as long as possible. Present Gogolata's envelope to the haughty houseboy who has come to find him.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_01<tab>ゴゴラタは、まだまだ宿を満喫したいようだ。彼を迎えに来た「鼻息荒い使用人」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F001 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_02<tab>Upon opening Gogolata's envelope to discover reservation papers for a stay at the Bobbing Cork, the hired hand dashes off in delight. Return to speak with Gogolata.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_02<tab>鼻息荒い使用人に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F001 /var>を渡した。彼は中身が「浮かぶコルク亭の宿泊予定表」だと分かると、ゴゴラタのもとに向かってしまった。浮かぶコルク亭にいる「ゴゴラタ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_03<tab>According to Gogolata, the hired hand expressed his gratitude, then rushed straight to his room where he now sleeps soundly. It would seem Gogolata is not the only one less than eager to return to Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_SEQ_03<tab>ゴゴラタによると、あの使用人は笑顔で感謝の言葉を述べ、客室に入っていったらしい。長旅で疲れた彼にとって、最高のプレゼントだったのだろう……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the envelope to the haughty houseboy.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_TODO_00<tab>鼻息荒い使用人に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86F001 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_000<tab>A cozy bed, warm meals, fine spirits... I tell you, friend, ever since I came here it's like I've died and gone to Nophica's bosom!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_000君もここの宿泊客……ではないようだね。
私は交易の途中に、この宿へ立ち寄ってねえ。
すっかり気に入ってしまって、ずいぶんな長居をしておる。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_001<tab>Go home to Ul'dah? To that ramshackle hovel where nothing awaits but my gil-pinching wife and her endless whinging? Never!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_001しかし、ついに迎えが来てしまったようだ……。
薄い布団、女房の小言、少ない小遣い、多すぎる税金……。
……いやだぁぁぁ！　ウルダハに帰りたくなぁぁぁいッ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_002<tab>Perhaps you can help me. My wife's hired some poor sop to bring me home, but I reckon this'll give him a change of heart.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_002……そういうことだ。
この「」を、迎えの者に渡してくれ。
私はまだまだ、この宿を満喫してやるのだからな！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOEI_000_010<tab>Wh-Whaddaya want!? The missus paid me good coin to bring her good-for-nothin' husband home.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOEI_000_010何だ、冒険者に用はないぞ。
意地でもゴゴラタ様を連れて帰らないと、奥様に……。
ああぁ……考えるだけで恐ろしい！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOEI_000_015<tab>Your gil don't mean nothin' to me. The missus paid me─hm? What in the hells? A room o' me own here at the Cork─plus all the ale I can drink─fully paid, courtesy o' Gogolata?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOEI_000_015フン、金なんて渡されても俺は……。
……ん？　これは、俺の分の宿泊予定表？
ふかふかのベッドと美味い紅茶が用意されてるだぁ！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOEI_000_016<tab>G-Get out of me way! I'm goin' to go give that man a piece of me mind!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOEI_000_016ふざけやがって……！　どけ！
ゴゴラタ様に直接言ってやる！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_030<tab>Hah hah! It would seem your efforts were a success. My wife's associate just stopped by a moment ago.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_030おお君か、ありがとう！
封筒を渡してくれたようだな！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_031<tab>Seems he wanted to express his gratitude in person. Downed a pint of ale and dashed right off to his room, where he's sleeping quite soundly, if his rather conspicuous snoring is any guide. Ahhh...the comforts of life on the road!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA810_00794_GOGOLATA_000_031先ほど、私のところに迎えの者が来てね。
激しく礼を言って、笑顔で客室に入っていったよ。
やれ、これでしばらくは、ゆっくり滞在できそうだ。
